message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it can significantly enhance your operations or personal life. For this exceptional opportunity, I am offering the product at $15000. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if you'd like to proceed with the purchase.
I'm very interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $13500?
